pages.text: $(li)Booflos are passive creatures that can be found using their mouths to fly over the $(l:patchouli:biomes/end/poise_forest)Poise Forests$(/l) of the End.$(br)$(li)Booflos can be tameable feeding them with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/bolloom_fruit)Bolloom Fruits$(/l) and, after that, staying away from them so that they do not become aggressive to you.$(br)$(li)You will have to repeat this process a few times.
Like Wolves collars, you can dye them applying Dyes right clicking of them while you are holding a Dye.

$(li)A tamed Booflo can be rided without a $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/saddle)Saddle$(/l). Just right click on it.$(br)$(li)It can be controlled with AWSD keys, but you will have to keep pushed the specific key, because this creature don't walk, it moves by jumping.$(br)$(li)You can fly with them using the Space key, you will have to keep pressing this key for a few seconds and then stop pressing it to fly.
$(li)Be careful with their stamina or they will get tired.

$(li)Tamed Booflos can be breed giving them $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/endergetic/poise_cluster)Poise Clusters$(/l).$(br)$(li)These interesting creatures may drop Booflo Hide on death.$(br)$(li)Booflos collars can be tinted right clicking on them while you are holding a Dye in your hand.
